thread.title: News Wrap: UN draft climate accord faces criticism PBS NewsHour
thread.title_full: Video: News Wrap: UN draft climate accord faces criticism | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: News Wrap: UN draft climate accord faces criticism PBS NewsHour
text: In our news wrap Monday, as a week of UN climate talks opened in Germany, African states complained that their demands for the draft accord had been ignored. Also, a security firm says that China's agreement not to hack U.S. corporate computers has already been violated repeatedly.
